input_email_body:
Subject: Urgent: Access Control Issues in Jira Software

Hello Customer Support Team,

I hope this message finds you well You can reach me at janesmith@company.com.. I am reaching out to report a significant issue concerning user permissions on the Jira Software platform, specifically version 8.20. Unfortunately, this issue is affecting our ability to effectively manage access control within the project management tool.

Several team members have reported problems where certain user permissions are either not being granted or are revoked unexpectedly. This inconsistency has impeded our workflow and caused disruptions in project completion timelines. We have attempted to manually reset the permissions to their appropriate levels; however, these changes are not reflected on the platform.

Given the nature of our business, the necessity for efficient and accurate access control to manage ongoing projects is critical My name is Liu Wei.. We kindly request your immediate attention in investigating this problem and providing a solution that will restore proper permissions and functional integrity without compromising the security and operational efficiency of our projects.

Could you please guide us on any potential troubleshooting steps that could be taken on our end while awaiting your technical assessment? Your prompt assistance in rectifying this issue would be greatly appreciated.

Thank you in advance for your support and understanding.

Best regards,

<name>
<company>
<tel_num>
<email_address>
